frontmatter.title: We Choose to go to the Moon

nodes.excerpt: There is no strife, no prejudice, no national conflict in outer space as yet. Its hazards are hostile to us all. Its conquest deserves the…
The view of the earth from the moon fascinated me - a small disk, 240,000 mniles away. It was hard to think that that little thing held so…
